channel.title: Recipes on My Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on My Recipes

item.title: Classic Lasagna
item.description: You might need a bit more cottage or ricotta cheese, especially if splitting between smaller pans. Also, you will only get two levels deep if you don’t have a really deep pan. Our contribution to this recipe comes from Ashley’s mother, which is adding a package of spicy Italian sausage to give some additional flavor.

item.title: Red Berry Tart
item.description: A favorite when I go to BBQs (parties, hackathons, your folks’ place), this red berry tart is fairly easy to make and packs a huge wow factor.

item.title: Best Big, Fat, Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookie
